biotools.summary: Generalized orientation-dependent, all-atom statistical potential for protein structure prediction. It was benchmarked against other state-the-art similar potentials and was shown to be significantly better for discriminating native structures from decoys.

bioschemas.name: GOAP
bioschemas.summary: Generalized orientation-dependent, all-atom statistical potential for protein structure prediction. It was benchmarked against other state-the-art similar potentials and was shown to be significantly better for discriminating native structures from decoys.
